statements: SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT product_name, stock_level FROM Inventory WHERE stock_level > 10;
SELECT id, product_name, store_location FROM Inventory WHERE store_location = 'Main Store';
SELECT id, product_name, store_location, stock_level FROM Inventory ORDER BY stock_level DESC;
SELECT id, store_location FROM Inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%chair%';
SELECT product_name, stock_level, store_location FROM Inventory WHERE stock_level > 10 ORDER BY stock_level DESC, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE store_location = 'New York' AND stock_level < 50 ORDER BY stock_level ASC;
SELECT id, product_name FROM Inventory WHERE store_location LIKE '%west%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT product_name, store_location FROM Inventory WHERE stock_level BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC, store_location DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE stock_level < 10 OR store_location = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY store_location ASC, id DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE store_location_id = 1;
SELECT store_name, address, contact_person FROM store_locations WHERE store_location_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels WHERE item_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE store_location_id = 1 AND quantity < 20;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE item_id = 1;
SELECT store_name, address, contact_person FROM store_locations WHERE store_location_id = 3;
SELECT item_name, quantity, store_name, address FROM inventory_levels JOIN store_locations ON inventory_levels.store_location_id = store_locations.store_location_id;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT store_name, address FROM store_locations WHERE contact_person LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, quantity, store_location FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT location_id, location_name FROM store_locations;
SELECT stock_id, product_id, location_id, available_quantity FROM stock_availability ORDER BY stock_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE store_location = 'New York';
SELECT product_name, store_location, available_quantity FROM inventory INNER JOIN stock_availability ON inventory.product_id = stock_availability.product_id;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;

SELECT product_name, location_name FROM inventory JOIN stock_availability ON inventory.product_id = stock_availability.product_id JOIN store_locations ON stock_availability.location_id = store_locations.location_id WHERE available_quantity >= 50;
SELECT DISTINCT store_location FROM inventory;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT store_location, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT location_name, address FROM locations WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity, store_location FROM inventory WHERE store_location IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles') AND quantity < 50 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT store_location, COUNT(*) FROM inventory GROUP BY store_location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 10.5 AND 20.0 ORDER BY category, price ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT i.product_name, i.quantity, l.location_name FROM inventory i JOIN store_inventory si ON i.id = si.product_id JOIN locations l ON si.store_id = l.location_id WHERE si.quantity < 20 AND l.address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY i.quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM inventory_levels WHERE store_id = 1 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT products.name, products.price FROM products JOIN stock_availability ON products.id = stock_availability.product_id WHERE stock_availability.available = TRUE;
SELECT store_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory_levels GROUP BY store_id;
SELECT store_locations.city, store_locations.state, COUNT(*) AS store_count FROM store_locations GROUP BY city, state ORDER BY store_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_levels ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, product_id, store_id FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT p.name, p.price, c.name as category FROM products p JOIN product_categories c ON p.category = c.id;
SELECT s.id, s.product_id, s.available FROM stock_availability s WHERE s.available = TRUE;
SELECT sl.city, sl.state, pl.name as product_name FROM store_locations sl JOIN products pl ON sl.id = pl.id;
